NEWATTRIBUTE_TEST.name: NEWATTRIBUTE_TEST

NEWATTRIBUTE_TEST.treatment: Fill in the recommendation for fixing the fail.

Service "Service B" has 0 outward dependencies.

Service "Service D" has 0 outward dependencies.
Service "Service E" has 3 outward dependencies.
Service "Service F" has 3 outward dependencies.
Service "Service G" has 2 outward dependencies.
Service "Service H" has 0 outward dependencies.
